= How to install TeXLive on FreeBSD =

There are basically two ways for running TeXLive on FreeBSD:
  * Use TeXLive ports from the FreeBSD-TeXLive repository;
  * Build your own TeXLive ports.

== Installing from the FreeBSD-TeXLive repository ==

FreeBSD ports for all TeXLive packages are located in the `releng` branch of the repository. Install it using portshaker:

{{{
shell> svn co "http://bsd-sharp.googlecode.com/svn/branches/portshaker/"
shell> cd portshaker
shell> make DESTDIR="/usr/local"
shell> make DESTDIR="/usr/local" install
shell> make -C examples DESTDIR="/usr/local" install
shell> cat << EOT > "/usr/local/etc/portshaker.conf"
mirror_base_dir="/var/cache/portshaker"
ports_trees="main"
main_ports_tree="/usr/ports"
main_merge_from="freebsd freebsd_texlive_releng"
EOT
shell> portshaker -v
}}}

== Building your own TeXLive ports ==

=== Checkout the FreeBSD-TeXLive repository ===

{{{
shell> svn co "http://bsd-sharp.googlecode.com/svn/branches/portshaker/"
shell> cd portshaker
shell> make DESTDIR="/usr/local"
shell> make DESTDIR="/usr/local" install
shell> make -C examples DESTDIR="/usr/local" install
shell> cat << EOT > "/usr/local/etc/portshaker.conf"
mirror_base_dir="/var/cache/portshaker"
ports_trees="main"
main_ports_tree="/usr/ports"
main_merge_from="freebsd texlive"
EOT
shell> portshaker -v
}}}

=== Checkout the TeXLive tarballs ===

{{{
shell> ftp -a "<TeXLive mirror>"
ftp> lcd "/usr/ports/distfiles/TeXLive/2008"
ftp> cd "pub/TeX/CTAN/systems/texlive/tlnet/2008/archive"
ftp> mget *
ftp> bye
}}}

=== Extract all tarballs ===

{{{
shell> mkdir "$HOME/universe"
shell> cd "$HOME/universe"
shell> for f in /usr/ports/distfiles/TeXLive/2008/*; do lzma -cdk $f | tar -xf - ; done
}}}

=== Install texlive-core ===

{{{
shell> cd /usr/ports/print/texlive-core
shell> make install clean
}}}

=== Generate all TeXLive ports ===

{{{
shell> cd /usr/ports/Tools/tlport
shell> make
shell> make run TLPOBJDIR="$HOME/universe/tlpkg/tlpobj" PORTSDIR="/usr/ports"
}}}
